attributes.title: Disappointed
attributes.review: I wait 427 day for this app to download and once I opened it, it was the most boring app in the App Store. Please don’t waste your time downloading this app.

attributes.title: I’m scared
attributes.review: This app made my phone freeze and turn off. When I turned it back on all my stuff was erased!!!!

attributes.title: The WORST App In The WORLD!!!!

Then all of a sudden at 3:30 pm making toast, the toast flies into the air all burnt and my dog eats it!🍞🔥AND I BLAME THIS APP! IM WARNING YOU WILL GET HACKED!

attributes.title: I 7h1nk 1m h4ck3d
attributes.review:
My ph0n3 k33p5 gl17ch1ng 3v3ry 5 m1nu735.
I think I’m okay for now. But it’ll start up again in a few minutes. I downloaded this app to support our president and after I did my phone started acting up. First I started getting texts and phone calls from foreign places. Then my phone started shutting down by itself. Now my phone glitches every five minutes to what it looks like above. I entered my card information on a the official trump website to order myself a new flag (after the terrorists antifa ruined my last one) and now money keeps disappearing from my account! I’m so scared I won’t be able to support my little Kaieytlynn and Jacob. We’re good honest people and my information is being taken from me! Don’t d0wnl04d 7h15 app!!!/23;;/ 1 7h1nk s0m30n3 h4ck3d 0ur pr3s1d3n75 app!!505505
Also. My pet goldfish died the same day I downloaded this app. I think it’s cursed. Let’s make America great again and delete this app from our phones so we can continue living our good and honest lives.

attributes.title: Dozens of spam calls after using this app
attributes.review:
When I saw this app I had to get it. Really want to support Trump in 2020. He really gets it. Well, I installed the app and the next day I’ve gotten dozens of spam calls and emails. I tried to unsubscribe, but they are still coming through. This is so annoying. 

I’m ok with the occasional email, but I’m not okay with Russian and Chinese calls and emails asking me for my credit card and social security number.

attributes.title: Garbage🤢
attributes.review: I opened this at expecting to persuade my sugar mama Millenia Trump to buy me a PS5 because I need a cougar to scam instead I found a ugly wrinkly orange with a small wiener and was disgusted to learn this is the man in office right now so in the words of the woo 💕FOUR💕IN💕HER💕

attributes.title: Please read this!
attributes.review: This app took 7 days to download! They have also been hacking into my account info! Please do not download this app! I am warning this app is absolutely a joke! It’s hacked into my smart fridge, my fridge started sing some weird music... my fridge continuously kept on doing this until it stopped, after it stopped it said ‘This song was written by Trump 2020 the app.’ Then my TV was playing For💕In💕Her. It is still playing it! It has been four days and my TV is still playing For💕In💕Her! I’m warning you do not download this app!💕✨🧚‍♀️👄🐒
